sentences.sentence: He shook his head in bewilderment at the obduracy of this man.
sentences.translation: 这男人顽固不化，令他困惑不解、连连摇头。

sentences.sentence: During the confusion and bewilderment of the second day Mary hid herself in the nursery and was forgotten by everyone.
sentences.translation: 在混乱和慌张的第二天，玛丽躲在育儿室里，被大家遗忘了。

sentences.sentence: Much to the bewilderment of professional scientists, quasi-religious cults are being formed around such unlikely topics as quantum physics, space-time relativity, black holes and the big bang.
sentences.translation: 令专业水准的科学家十分困惑的是，准宗教崇拜正围绕量子物理学、时空相对论、黑洞和大爆炸等不太可能的话题而形成。
